original_title: 「昨日、俺の種無しが判明しました。でも、嫁は妊娠4ヶ月です…」
overview: My wife has always wanted a child. She was not blessed with a child, and she went through fertility treatment together. And her wife is now four months pregnant. Such a happy time crumbled with a single piece of paper... [Azoospermia] What is it that was listed in her semen test chart that her wife hid? She said her wife loved me too much and she was held by another man so she wouldn't hurt me because she...she loves me...
title: Yesterday I Found Out I Was Impotent, But My Wife is Somehow 4 Months Pregnant…, Starring Mayuki Ito
